Main Content Region



Strategic Communication 













 
 







Using social media at CSUSB
Access the CSUSB Social Media Handbook and submit your CSUSB accounts to the social media directory.







 







CSUSB Brand Identity Management
Align your unit with the CSUSB brand by using university-approved logos and support graphics.







 







Publications and Graphic Design
The graphic design unit of Strategic Communication produces a variety of CSUSB publications and supporting materials, including the CSUSB Magazine, university marketing and advancement support materials.







 







Publicity and Media Relations
The Office of Strategic Communication is your partner in securing media coverage and publicity. Click here for a list of resources and how we can assist your department.





























												Campus Services
					
Other support services include graphic design, publication production, editorial development, and photography and video production support.
















												Downloadable Resources
					
Access to a variety of branding tools, including CSUSB’s logos, generic letterhead templates, and branded PowerPoint templates.
















												Emergency Communication
					
In an emergency that could cause a university closure, a list of resources for police, fire, medical, etc., and print and television news media.
















												Identity & Graphic Standards
					
Everything you need to know about the university's visual identity and brand. 
















												Media Relations & Publicity
					
Resources for the media about CSUSB, including faculty expertise.
















												Media Relations & Training
					
Tips for interviews with the media, print or television; what is newsworthy; the benefits of speaking to media; and developing key messages.
















												NEWS: Inside CSUSB
					
A recap of the day’s news stories with links to the university’s news website, local media news clips, the CSU system’s news clips, videos and RSS feeds.
















												Social Media @ CSUSB
					
A directory of social media sites at CSUSB, including Facebook, YouTube, Twitter and others. Includes blogs and the CSUSB Social Media Handbook.
















												Trademarks & Promotional Items
					
Logo requests for print, Web or merchandise and its licensing restrictions; lists of authorized licensed vendors.
